column4: hello guys, i removed compiz from my ubuntu and after restart i didnt see any windows-manager. Can anyone help me out.
what do you see now?
all i can see is only desktop.
Only the wallpaper?
all of my data is there
Try alt+F2, and enter:  metacity --replace
through terminal i can do everything
try through terminal, only if you don't get a run box on pressing Alt+F2
will it replace old lap
i mean same as before removing the compiz
why you removed compiz in the first place?
melvinc, i want to remove effects, dashhome, from my ubuntu version. i want menu bar which is like 10.04, 10.10.
then just apt-get install gnome-panel
that will give you gnome classic interface similar to Gnome 2... well almost.
through google i found  that if i remove compiz i will get menu bar. so i did it
well, that will remove the animations, but will break your Unity desktop, because it runs as a Compiz plugin :(
sudo apt=get install gnome-panel
u mean so i cant get menu bar
of course, you will get menus, but you won't be running Unity. (Is this what you asked for?)
yes
Welcome to Ubuntu. Do remember to take backups before you experiment :)
thanx for that i dont have anything for taking bckup.. I am leaning linux (new comer) :D
i installed gnome-panel
